name: 2014 Custom Design Spot
description:
Custom Design Spot. 
Purchasing this listing reserves one design spot.

Do you need the PERFECT gift, birthday dress, or extra special dress for your next vacation? Looking for truly one of a kind school spirit wear or a stand out outfit to wear to the holiday party? Custom Daydream Believers Designs are FINALLY available again!

I LOVE custom design projects! I believe life should be celebrated!  Your child's clothes should be a reflection of their personalities; unique, original, wonderful! My design aesthetic combines classic, vintage styles with fresh, modern fabrics. I am THRILLED to be able to offer you the opportunity to commission a custom outfit for your little one!

ONCE YOU PLACE THIS ORDER, YOU WILL RECEIVE A CUSTOM ORDER DESIGN CONSULTATION FORM VIA EMAIL. PLEASE FILL IT OUT COMPLETELY AND SUBMIT IT ONCE YOU ARE READY. TAKE AS LONG AS YOU NEED TO FILL IT OUT - THE DESIGN PROCESS FOR YOUR CUSTOM ORDER WILL BEGIN ONCE I'VE RECEIVE YOUR COMPLETED FORM. 

::
This listing is for 
ONE Custom Design Spot. 

In order to give every piece I make my fullest attention, I have to limit the number of custom orders I take on each month. By purchasing this listing, you are reserving one of these design spots!  

  
--{Process}--

RESERVE YOUR SPOT -
Purchasing this listing will reserve your custom design spot. This deposit will be deducted from the final cost of your order. After purchasing this listing, you will receive a Custom Order Design Constulation Form via email.  ONCE THIS FORM HAS BEEN SUBMITTED TO DBD, YOUR RESERVATION WILL BE CONFIRMED. 

DESIGN CONSULTATION – 
Once I review your design consultation form, I will put together a custom design board for you outlining style options, fabric choices, and price quotes.

DESIGN APPROVAL – 
(Due atleast 4 weeks prior to ship date)
At this stage, you make your final design choices :) Then I will write up a custom listing for you to purchase directly through the Daydream Believers Shop.


FINAL PAYMENT- 
Once purchase is made and payment is finalized I will create your custom piece(s)! Please allow 4-6 weeks for completion, from the date I receive your final payment. Typically, orders are ready soon than this (I'm usually SO excited, I can't wait to begin!) - but the 4-6 week window allow me ample time to find the perfect fabrics and embellishments for your order!

ORDER SHIPS
Order will ship USPS Priority Mail with delivery confirmation, unless other arrangements are made between customer and designer.

---

AGREEMENT:
By purchasing this listing the client is reserving a custom design spot and is agreeing to the terms and conditions of this listing. Please note, I do not charge a separate design fee; the price for your custom piece will vary based on the styles you select.
Your $10 deposit is non-refundable. This deposit will be deducted from your order total.

Thank you for choosing  Daydream Believers! 
I look forward to designing for you!

options.name: One Custom Design Spot for FEBRUARY 2014

name: Rue's Wrap Jacket
description:
::The Details::
Rue is a showstopper! Made from cheery red fabric with bright white polka dots and embellished with soft white fleece, Rue features a stylish wrap style, a full skirt and handcrafted ruffles. Fully lined with soft white cotton - your gal will love twirling around town in this great jacket!

All seams are professionally finished and top stitched as needed.

::The Fine Print:: 
This jacket is available in sizes 18m - 8. Each jacket is MADE TO ORDER. For more details, please visit www.daydreambelieversdesigns.com

Rue was created using a pattern from Create Kids Couture.

name: Gorgeous One of a Kind Pinafore and Dress ::OOAK::
description:
Vintage inspired pinafore and sleeveless a-line frock; set includes BOTH fabulous pieces!

The chic “Babs” style dress features an a-line silhouette, ruffle neckline and center pleat detail! Vintage inspired shorter length looks great on its own or paired with tights and boots! This sweet dress closes in the back with a gorgeous orange button.

The pinafore features a ‘70s style “bubble ruffle” embellishment on the front of the bodice and down both straps. This sweet pinnie is an easy to wear style with long straps (to tie into a nice big bow!) and a full, twirly skirt. The pinafore is open in back to reveal the gorgeous details on the back of the dress. 

This beautiful color combination is PERFECT for Fall!

Mix and match the pinafore and frock for numerous fashionable combinations!
Only one available! Size 6 – Ready to ship!

All seams have been professionally finished for durability.

name: The Audrey. White Knit Bateau Ballet Boat Neck Top with 3/4 sleeves
description:
::The Details::

”Audrey” is not your average little-kid-knit-top! 
Featuring a classic bateau neckline and easy to wear 3/4 sleeves: 
Audrey is a nod to vintage style that always looks great! 
I made this fresh version of Audrey from a classic white knit. Great for layering or on it's own -
This is a MUST HAVE addition to every queen bee's wardrobe!


Coordinating skirt available for purchase in the shop!

::The Fine Print::

Each top will be made to order, making it truly unique for each child! 

Available in your choice of size: 2t - 8 please message me for detailed sizing information.

Current production time is 2 weeks.



Pattern courtesy of WeeMuses.
